note.p: Education: Corpus Christi College, Cambridge (admitted 1664); Lincoln's Inn (admitted 1665)
Career: Apothecary; Dealer in tea, coffee, chocolate and other luxury items; Editor of periodicals on the improvement of husbandry and trade
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; Hunter; LI
Authority: Year of birth from Hunter.
References: Geoffrey Cantor, 'Quakers in the Royal Society, 1660-1750' in NR 1997 vol 51 pp 175-193
